title: Front End Engineer (Embedded Team)
description:
Smashing Boxes is looking for a talented Front End Engineer with experience working with the Angular.js framework. The right candidate has a knack for problem solving and a passion for web technologies. In this position, you will represent Smashing Boxes by working onsite at client locations to create usable, accessible, and semantic user interfaces for their web applications. Your team will include both Smashing Boxes developers working on-site and members of the client's engineering teams.

The ideal candidate, in addition to being proficient in the relevant languages and techniques, is engaged in the web community and is in-the-know about current trends, advancements, and releases.
